channel.title: WP76xx kernel module update
channel.description:
Hi All, I would like to compile and update one kernel module into mangOH Red board with WP7608. Could you please provide compilation procedure for Linux kernel module?. I am using Release 16. I am trying to include CONFIG_USB_LAN78XX and gpio module CONFIG_GPIO_MAX732X.
Thanks, Raghavan K.

item.title: WP76xx kernel module update
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
you can open the ./kernel/arch/arm/configs/mdm9607_defconfig
and add your configuration

Read full topic
